resources.string: You would like to spend your time:
If you got a supernatural power, what would it be?
You would likely to be trapped in?
What would you do, if your best friend was in danger?
Princess Anna from the movie Frozen!

You\'re cheerful, goofy, optimistic, loyal, extrovert and a hopeless romantic with a pure and loving heart. You are sweet yet tenacious. To you, family matters the most. They might not talk to you or shut you out, but you still love them like how Anna loves Elsa. Like you, a selfless Kristoff is waiting for you somewhere out there. Hope you find him soon!

You are a bookworm, bossy and a graceful women. You won\'t mind spending your whole life in a library. You are smart, intelligent and the best there is and ever will be. You always think before you act. You have zero tolerance level. You are sometimes rude but know how to make up with people. Other people\'s opinion matters to you. You are a great wizard. And its leviOsa!

You friendly and enthusiastic, but sometimes you show over enthusiasm. You don\'t hold grudges. Sometimes people say you are blind because you cannot see the things in front of you. You enjoy sports. You wear same clothes everyday. God knows why you are always talking to your stuffs. Swiper No Swiping!

You are a strong women. You do not like people to know much about you. You have the most awesome friend circle anyone could have. You guys like to call yourself The Avengers. You are always in a fight with you rival group Justice League. You always have your friends back. On the outside, you are a superhuman but you do have soft heart!

You are the most holy person on this planet! You are strong much like a devil inside a human\'s body. You are sometimes scary. You just want everyone\'s souls. God knows what will you do with them. You live inside a case and it is better that nobody opens it. You like to play pranks on others. Stop getting more and more scary!

You are like the God of Mischief, likes to play around and have some fun. You are a bit self centered but will join forces if necessary. Your relationship with people can be a bit complicated sometimes, but it doesn\'t bother you that much. You don\'t see yourself as a superhero but you are. You have a soft heart for your family and will fight for them if needed!

In your mind, you are a genius, billionaire and philanthropist. If not the favourite, but you are everyone\'s need. People seems to believe that you are a self centered guy, but you do care for your fellas and always have their back. You always find solutions to yours and other people\'s problems. You are a true leader. You are Iron Man!

You are a prodigy or you can say you are the chosen one. You have a small but trustworthy friend circle. There are some ups and downs in your life but you have a strong character. You are a true friend and would do anything for others. You and your friends likes adventure once in a while. You are a true wizard. Expecto Patronum!

You are funny and everyone\'s favourite. You love choco-chips and Action Kamen. Your mom thrashes you everyday but it doesn\'t seems to bother you. You have a weird fashion sense. You are brutally honest, highly curious and has no shame whatsoever but you have a kind nature. You sometimes display a level of maturity beyond your usual self in concern of others. You truly care for others despite your constant disrespectful nature!
